mapper.select: select sum(quantity) as totalqnt, sum((price2*quantity)) as totalprice2, sum((price3*quantity)) as totalprice3 from (select d.pseq,p.kind,p.name, d.quantity, p.price1,p.price2,p.price3, o.id,o.indate from orders o, order_detail d, product p where d.oseq = o.oseq and d.pseq = p.pseq and o.indate BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-01-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
